home.summary-text: I am a full-stack developer with over {{experienceYears}} years of experience in designing and implementing modern, scalable web applications. My areas of expertise include designing websites, web applications, web services, and Telegram bots. My focus is on creating secure, fast, and user-friendly systems. I have extensive experience in freelance projects and team collaboration, and I always aim to provide creative solutions and continuously improve the user experience.
experience-items: Design and implement dynamic and responsive user interfaces
Develop secure and scalable backend systems with Node.js and PHP
Implement secure APIs for system integration and improve interactions between services
Build bots Telegram with interactive capabilities and modern design to automate processes
Optimizing website performance by reducing loading time by up to 30%
Analyzing customer needs and providing customized solutions
Designing management dashboards with a focus on user experience

portfolio-items.title: Forex trading platform
portfolio-items.description: Responsive web application in the form of a Telegram mini-app with implementation of user authentication, subscription management, connection to web service and forex trading via dedicated server infrastructure.

portfolio-items.title: Web Service Platform
portfolio-items.description: Responsive website for providing and managing web services, including user registration, account balance management, access to APIs, and service consumption control.

portfolio-items.title: Digital Menu Platform
portfolio-items.description: Design and development of a comprehensive platform for digitizing and managing store menus with a special focus on restaurants, cafes, fast food and food businesses. This system has been implemented with the aim of eliminating paper menus, improving customer experience and simplifying the content management process for business owners.

portfolio-items.title: Digital Currency Exchange
portfolio-items.description: Responsive web application in the form of a Telegram mini-app with the ability to authenticate users, deposit and withdraw digital currency, convert cryptocurrencies, and display the market view in real time.

portfolio-items.title: Corporate Website
portfolio-items.description: Design and implementation of a corporate website with a focus on brand identity, smooth user experience, and performance optimization, suitable for introducing services and increasing user interaction.

portfolio-items.title: Project Ad Registration and Management System
portfolio-items.description: Advanced Telegram bot for complete project ad management, including purchasing monthly subscriptions, automatic ad registration and review, online payment, publishing on channels, admin panel, and sending public messages.

education-items: Associate of Computer Engineering | Hormozgan University | 2022
